Params: {3: "You manage to follow the voices and find everyone, but it is still dark. It is near impossible to find the way out with Polar Soldier's weak light."}
{3: 'You try to listen carefully but cannot hear the familiar "meow" in the utter silence. All your calling has also gone nowhere.'}
{3: 'The light on Polar Soldier begins to flicker as the energy runs low. The air nearby gets even colder, chilling you to the bone through the thick armor.'}
{3: 'You try to control the trembling voice and continue to call Tiger, but it is not responding.'}
{3: 'When you look up, you realize the crescent moon has changed its shape.'}
{3: 'It has turned into a small tiger head, flying away.'}
{3: 'The flames from its tailpipe form a line of text—'}
{3: '"Congratulations, you have cleared all the stages"'}
{3: 'Tiger has already become light. It turns around as if it has heard your calling.'}
{3: 'It turns its ears a bit, as if it is saying goodbye.'}
